AP Top 25 Takeaways: Interims go 4-0; Alabama misses Bryce
By: Ralph D. Russo

Source: The Associated Press

Maybe making a coaching change less than halfway through the season isn't such a terrible idea.
After an unprecedented spate of early season firings
